column2: "Hey, you made it back in one piece, huh? Your report checks out, so I'd say everything went just fine."
"If you keep wielding that sword like that, you won't have anything to worry about."
"Oh, and go ahead and keep it. It's all yours."
"Well, see you around, pal. Keep practicing with that sword!"
"You can now call Ohza as a partner."

"A new Client Order is available for Jozsef.

Jozsef can be found in the Gate Area, second floor."
